name: Events Manager – Events / Locations Slider
author: Stonehenge Creations

sections.description:
Requires Events Manager (free plugin) to be installed & activated.

This add-on lets you create a slider (carousel or fade) for your upcoming Events Manager events and/or locations. It work just like as EM’s native [events_list], but will show the content in a slider instead of a list. You can use the exact same parameters as you are already used to in Events Manager.
[events_slider scope=”future” category=”3″]

It supports all native Events Manager features:
If it works in EM, it should work in this slider as well. ðŸ™‚

  • Supports all native Events Manager search arguments
  • Supports Event Placeholders and Location Placeholders
  • Supports full HTML formatting
  • MultiSite compatible: [events_slider blog=”all”]

The plugin core is based on bxSlider.

Support is technical.
I make it work, you make it pretty.

Localization

  • US English (default)
  • Dutch (included in the download)

The plugin is ready to be translated, all texts are defined in the POT file. Any contributions to localize this plugin are very welcome!

Feedback

I am open to your suggestions and feedback!
Please also check out my other plugins.
sections.installation:
1. Download the .zip file and upload it to wp-content/plugins.
  2. Active the plugin in the WordPress plugin page.
  3. In the EM Add-ons Menu a new sub item will be created: Sliders.
  4. Set your preferences.
  5. Add the shortcode [events_slider] to any page or post to display the slider.
sections.faq:
Are you part of the Events Manager team?

No, I am not associated with Events Manager or its developer, NetWebLogic, in any way.
sections.changelog:
1.8.7

  • Updated bxSlider to version 4.2.14
  • New Plugin Banner and Plugin Icon
  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.9
  • Confirmed compatibility with PHP 8.0.14
  • Confirmed compatibility with Events Manager 5.12.1

1.8.5

  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.6.1.

1.8.4

  • Added missing folder to the WordPress repository. (Previous upload went wrong, apparently)

1.8.3

  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.4.3.

1.8.1

  • Bug fix in updater.

1.8.0

  • Updated code to be in line with other Stonehenge Creations plugins.
  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.4.1.

1.7.1

  • Minor bugs fixed.

1.7.0

  • Re-coded the core to be compatible with the upcoming EM Pro – PDF Gift Cards plugin.
  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.4.
  • Confirmed compatibility with PHP 7.4.2.

1.6.2

  • Added missing a missing file to the WP Repository, that crashed the previous version.

1.6.1

  • Updated code to be compatible with PHP 7.4.

1.6.0

  • Minor bug fixes in the core code.
  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.3.2
  • Confirmed compatibility with Events Manager 5.9.7.1

1.5.9

  • Improved plugin dependencies.
  • Some cosmetic changes to prepare for WordPress 5.3.
  • Confirmed compatibility with WordPress 5.3.

short_description: Create a dynamic Slider (carousel or fade) for Events and Locations with the default Events Manager arguments, using a simple shortcode.
